argumentText:
ARGUMENT
s x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_df-brsiga | |- BrSiga = ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_retop | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top |
| 3 |  | #P_df-sigagen | |- sigaGen = ( x e. _V |-> |^| { s e. ( sigAlgebra ` U. x ) | x C_ s } ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_funmpt2 | |- Fun sigaGen |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. _V |
| 6 |  | #P_sigagensiga | |- ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. _V -> ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) e. ( sigAlgebra ` U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_elrnsiga | |- ( ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) e. ( sigAlgebra ` U. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) -> ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_mp2b | |- ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) e. U. ran sigAlgebra |
| 9 |  | #P_0elsiga | |- ( ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) e. U. ran sigAlgebra -> (/) e. ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_elfvdm | |- ( (/) e. ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) -> ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. dom sigaGen ) |
| 11 | 8, 9, 10 | #P_mp2b | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. dom sigaGen |
| 12 |  | #P_funfvima | |- ( ( Fun sigaGen /\ ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. dom sigaGen ) -> ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top -> ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) e. ( sigaGen " Top ) ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 11, 12 | #P_mp2an | |- ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top -> ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) e. ( sigaGen " Top ) ) |
| 14 | 2, 13 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( sigaGen ` ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) e. ( sigaGen " Top ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_eqeltri | |- BrSiga e. ( sigaGen " Top ) |
